Privacy Policy

At SinzTools, your privacy is our top priority. We are committed to being transparent about how we handle data.

No File Uploads

Most of our current tools do not require uploading files to any server. All processing for these tools happens directly in your web browser on your device.

No File Storage

For current tools, we do not store, save, or retain any of your files. Once you close your browser or navigate away, no traces remain on our servers.

Analytics & Privacy

SinzTools uses privacy-friendly analytics provided by Cloudflare to understand general site usage. These analytics do not use cookies, do not track users across websites, and do not collect personally identifiable information.

Future Changes

In the future, we may add basic analytics or advertising to support the site, or introduce tools that require server-side processing. Any such changes will be optional, clearly disclosed, and this policy will be updated accordingly.

If you have questions, please contact us.

We believe tools should respect your privacy by default.
